gov.usgs.traveltime

Class TTHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.net.GenericServerHandler
        • gov.usgs.traveltime.TTHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class TTHandler
extends GenericServerHandler
    This class is to handle the TravelTime specialization of the GenericServer for handling travel time requests. 
     Command SESSION model -rec ddd:elev:[srclat:srclon] [-allph][-tec][-plot][-back][-rstt][-ph ph1:ph2:...:pnN]
 SESSION           This must be the first word on the line and one must be issued on connection
 model             This is a model name like 'ak135'
 -src   ddd:elev:[srclat:srclon]  Set the source depth, elevation, and optinally  latitude and longitude
 -allph            Set the return all phases (Def = false return useful phases)
 -back             set to return back branches (Def = false do not return back branches)
 -tec              Set to convert tectonic (def = false do not  map Pb and Sb onto Pg and Sg)
 -rstt             Set to use RSTT for crustal phases (def = false)
 -plot             Set plot mode - this does not yet seem to be implemented
 -ph   ph1:ph2:..:phN  Set to return the listed phases only
 Command GETTT delta[:recelev[:reclat:reclon:recazm]] Get travel times for the given receiver information
 GETTT             This must be the first word on the line
 -rec  delta[:recelev[:reclat:reclon:recazm]] where these are the receiver distance
                   And optional recever elevation, on for complex cases receiver latitude
                   longitude and back azimuth
